category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SM_Gantt_Filter_Properties
preference.preference_description: Defines the Schedule Task properties to be displayed in the filter panel in Gantt sub location. The property must be an attribute of Schedule Task or its sub types. The order of the preference values defines the display order of properties in the filter panel. Valid values are: * Internal names of any single valued persistent attribute on Schedule Task except reference attributes. (Array, runtime, reference, relation and compound properties are not supported.) * 'ResourceAssignment' and 'schedule_deliverable_list'. These are special filter properties to display resources and schedule deliverables assigned to Schedule Tasks respectively.
